channel.title: How can I set a portal to have lvl 100 req

item.title: How can I set a portal to have lvl 100 req
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

This is all the doors with same object

[code][left] if ((objectID == 9369) && (objectX == 2399) && (objectY == 5176)) {
// Hot vent door A
if (absY == 5177 && combatLevel >= 100) {
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5175;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to be level 100 or above to go in, sorry”);

			}
		}
		if ((objectID == 9369) && (objectX == 2399) && (objectY == 5176)) {
			// Hot vent door AA
			if (absY == 5175) {
				teleportToX = 2399;
				teleportToY = 5177;
				

			}
		}

		if ((objectID == 9368) && (objectX == 2399) && (objectY == 5168)) {
			// Hot vent door B
			if (absY == 5169 && combatLevel >= 100) {
				teleportToX = 2399;
				teleportToY = 5167;
				} else {
				sendMessage("You need to be level 100 or above to go in, sorry");
			}
		}
		if ((objectID == 9368) && (objectX == 2399) && (objectY == 5168)) {
			// Hot vent door BB
			if (absY == 5167) {
				teleportToX = 2399;
				teleportToY = 5169;


			}[/left][/code]

item.title: How can I set a portal to have lvl 100 req
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:2, topic:167423”]change

if (absY == 5177) {
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5175;
}

to
if (absY == 5177 && combatLevel >= 100) {
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5175;
} else {
sendMessage(“you need to be lvl 100 to enter!”);
}[/quote]

Thanks!!! BTW Great server u got just couldnt find the enterance to Jad lol so I am adding that atm =)

Read full topic
